post.title: Coffee Break
post.content: I’ve had a solid morning of meetings. I’m a little sick. My wife leaving town for a few days. Last but not least, things seem afwul quiet out in the blogoshpere. Thus, no Morning Coffee post today or Monday. See you Tuesday.
